inclusion.criterion: Laparoscopic surgical procedure of 2 hours duration requiring IV fluid administration for at least 24 hours
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Uncorrected plasma sodium level before surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diseases which cause abnormal ADH secretion
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Wilson disease, which is a genetic disorder that affects the liver and brain. He has been experiencing tremors since a year ago and has a Kayser-Fleischer ring in his ophthalmologic exam.
